attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to ensure that any convicted criminal  who refuses  to discuss details of their crime as part of the formal rehabilitation process, whilst undergoing his or her sentence, is declared ineligible for release at any time until after they complete the rehabilitation process, on the grounds that they have not completed their sentence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Faith exemptions are being claimed by individuals whose heritage is not based on christianity. Anybody who does not complete mandatory rehabilitation MUST be treated as having not completed their sentence and as long as that situation obtains they should be kept in prison.  They remain a serious danger to the public and our society if they are not rehabilitated during their term of imprisonment.
